topics.description: Topics to subscribe to, multiple can be defined with comma. Wildcard characters are supported (+ - for single level and # - for multi level). By default all subscription used QoS=0. To set a different QoS, write the QoS desired after the topic preceded by a colom. For Example: topicA:1,topicB:2

jsonParseBody.description: Whether to try parse the message to an object

onlyMessage.description: Whether to return only the message property

parallelProcessing.description: Whether to process messages in parallel or by keeping the message in order
